name: ArticleChildren

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the ArticleChild.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the ArticleChild with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the ArticleChild with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the ArticleChildren within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The ArticleChild, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ArticleChild, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ArticleChild, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ArticleChild, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first ArticleChild in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last ArticleChild in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle ArticleChild in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the ArticleChild with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the ArticleChild that follows the desired ArticleChild.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the ArticleChild whose index follows the specified ArticleChild in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The ArticleChild whose index comes before the desired ArticleChild.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any ArticleChild in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every ArticleChild in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ArticleChild.
Returns the ArticleChild with the specified index.

description: A collection of group items that are also part of an article.
